org.dkpro.statistics.agreement.coding

Interface ICodingAnnotationItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAnnotationItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodingAnnotationItem

    public interface ICodingAnnotationItem
extends IAnnotationItem
    Represents a single annotation item of an ICodingAnnotationStudy. In coding tasks, annotation items are fixed, and each rater is asked to code each item. The category assigned by a certain rater is represented as annotation units. Thus, an annotation item of a coding study consists of multiple annotation units.
    Author:
    Christian M. Meyer
    See Also:
    IAnnotationUnit, ICodingAnnotationStudy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRaterCount()
      Returns the number of raters who annotated this item with a non-null category.
      IAnnotationUnit getUnit(int raterIdx)
      Returns the annotation unit of the rater with the specified index.
      Iterable<IAnnotationUnit> getUnits()
      Returns all coding units for this annotation item (i.e., the categories assigned by the individual raters).

    • Method Detail

      • getUnit

        IAnnotationUnit getUnit(int raterIdx)
        Returns the annotation unit of the rater with the specified index. That is, the object holding the category assigned to the item by the specified rater.

      • getUnits

        Iterable<IAnnotationUnit> getUnits()
        Returns all coding units for this annotation item (i.e., the categories assigned by the individual raters).

      • getRaterCount

        int getRaterCount()
        Returns the number of raters who annotated this item with a non-null category.
